description: The BGP Established event is generated when
the BGP FSM enters the ESTABLISHED state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2Established FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLocalAddrType i 0 FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLocalAddr s EXAMPLE FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerRemoteAddrType i 0 FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerRemoteAddr s EXAMPLE FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLastErrorReceived s EX FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerState i 1

description: The address family of the local end of the peering
session.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLocalAddrType

description: The address of the local end of the peering session.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLocalAddr

description: The address family of the remote end of the peering
session.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerRemoteAddrType

description: The address of the remote end of the peering session.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerRemoteAddr

description: The last error code and subcode received by this BGP
Speaker via a NOTIFICATION message for this peer.
If no error has occurred, this field is zero.
Otherwise, the first byte of this two byte
OCTET STRING contains the error code, and the second
byte contains the subcode.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLastErrorReceived

description: The remote BGP peer's FSM state.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerState

description: The BGPBackwardTransition Event is generated
when the BGP FSM moves from a higher numbered
state to a lower numbered state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2BackwardTransition FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLocalAddrType i 0 FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLocalAddr s EXAMPLE FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerRemoteAddrType i 0 FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerRemoteAddr s EXAMPLE FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLastErrorReceived s EX FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLastErrorReceivedText s EXAMPLE FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerState i 1

description: The address family of the local end of the peering
session.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLocalAddrType

description: The address of the local end of the peering session.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLocalAddr

description: The address family of the remote end of the peering
session.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerRemoteAddrType

description: The address of the remote end of the peering session.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerRemoteAddr

description: The last error code and subcode received by this BGP
Speaker via a NOTIFICATION message for this peer.
If no error has occurred, this field is zero.
Otherwise, the first byte of this two byte
OCTET STRING contains the error code, and the second
byte contains the subcode.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLastErrorReceived

description: This object contains an implementation specific
explanation of the error that was reported.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerLastErrorReceivedText

description: The remote BGP peer's FSM state.
variables.name: FORCE10-BGP4-V2-MIB::f10BgpM2PeerState
